channel.title: Archival Research on Rick Wysocki
channel.description: Recent content in Archival Research on Rick Wysocki

item.title: Link Roundup: July 29, 2024
item.description: This week’s articles touch on the idea of how complexity emerges from simple systems.

item.title: Memory, Document, Archive
item.description: By collecting and categorizing historical artifacts, archives deeply influence the historical record. But they exist in complicated institutional settings, and archivists can’t always have full control over how their archives present history. Researchers have to consider the archive less as a neutral place and more as a motivated and rhetorical construction.
